Authors:
Yong-Zhong Lu, Saranyaphat Boonmee, Dong-Qin Dai, Jian-Kui
Liu, Kevin D Hyde, Jayarama D. Bhat, Hiran Ariyawansa, Ji-Chuan
KANG
Title:
Four new species of Tubeufia (Tubeufiaceae, Tubeufiales) from
Thailand
Abstract:
Tubeufia was named for a sexual morph taxon. However,
several asexual morph species have also been accommodated in this genus.
In this study, four new species of Tubeufia, viz. T. filiformis, T.
latispora, T. laxispora and T. mackenziei are described and illustrated.
The phylogenetic placement of the new species are confirmed by analysis
of combined ITS, LSU and TEF1α sequence data. A key to Tubeufia species
is provided and the new species are compared with similar fungal
taxa.
